metadata.synopsis: A young woman (Monique van de Ven) offers a ride to a hitchhiking sculptor (Rutger Hauer) and embarks upon a difficult romance with him.

reviews: Okay, the film is flawed - excessive, even unstable. So what? It never loses its balance. It is also fresh, liberated, oddly touching and wholly convincing.
...a wisp of a movie that suffers from an almost total dearth of memorable elements...
A reminder that Verhoeven actually made good movies back in Holland
Powerful, but lacks a clear sense of meaning.
